00020 class model_hbond_surf_t : public hbond_surface_t{
00021 public:
00022 
00023   model_hbond_surf_t(const std::string& data_line, PDBBase& prot_atoms,
00024                      const uint level=2) ;
00025   
00026   model_hbond_surf_t(const model_hbond_surf_t& src)
00027     : hbond_surface_t(src), A_mesh_surf(src.A_mesh_surf)
00028   { 
00029     init();
00030     do_copy(src); 
00031   }
00032 
00033   model_hbond_surf_t& operator=(const model_hbond_surf_t& src)
00034   {
00035     if(this == &src) return *this;
00036 
00037     hbond_surface_t::operator=(src);
00038     A_mesh_surf = src.A_mesh_surf;
00039     do_copy(src);
00040     return *this;
00041   }
00042 
00043   virtual ~model_hbond_surf_t()
00044   { 
00045     if(A_dists) delete [](A_dists);
00046     if(A_closest_pts) delete [](A_closest_pts);
00047     init(); 
00048   }
00049

00051   transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00052   { A_mesh_surf.transform(R, T); }

00055   inverse_transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00056   { A_mesh_surf.inverse_transform(R, T); }

00078   compute_best_terms(std::vector<hbond_surface_t>::iterator surfs_begin,
00079                      std::vector<hbond_surface_t>::iterator surfs_end,
00080                      my_float_t *AA_DD_terms, my_float_t *doneptor_terms,

00110   { return A_closest_pts +  3 * num_verts(); }

00129   { A_mesh_surf.write_msms_headers(vert_out, face_out); }
00130 
00131   inline void
00132   write_msms_cap(std::ostream &vert_out, std::ostream &face_out) const
00133   { A_mesh_surf.write_msms_cap(vert_out, face_out, act_type); }
00134 
00135 private:
00136   bool
00137   adjust_terms(const my_float_t dot_prod, const my_float_t distance,
00138                const my_float_t dist_tol, my_float_t* row) const
00139   {
00140     // Compute the best value for each term
00141     row[0] = 1;
00142     row[1] = (row[1] < dot_prod ? dot_prod : row[1]);
00143         
00144     my_float_t linear_w = (dist_tol - distance) / dist_tol;
00145     if(row[2] < linear_w){
00146       row[2] = linear_w;
00147       row[3] = linear_w * linear_w;
00148     }
00149 
00150 /*
00151     std::cout << "linear W: " << linear_w << std::endl;
00152     std::cout << "dot_prod: " << dot_prod << std::endl;
00153     std::cout << "row[4]: " << row[4] << std::endl;
00154 */
00155     my_float_t tmp = linear_w * dot_prod;
00156     if(row[4] < tmp){
00157       row[4] = tmp;
00158       row[5] = tmp * linear_w;
00159       return true;
00160     }
00161     return false;
00162   }
00163 
00164   void
00165   do_copy(const model_hbond_surf_t& src)
00166   {
00167     if(src.A_closest_pts){
00168       if(A_closest_pts) delete [](A_closest_pts);
00169       size_t N = 3 * src.A_mesh_surf.num_verts();
00170       A_closest_pts = new my_float_t[N];
00171       std::copy(src.A_closest_pts, src.A_closest_pts + N, A_closest_pts);
00172     }else A_closest_pts = 0;
00173 
00174     if(src.A_dists){
00175       if(A_dists) delete [](A_dists);
00176       size_t N = src.A_mesh_surf.num_verts();
00177       A_dists = new my_float_t[N];
00178       std::copy(src.A_dists, src.A_dists + N, A_dists);
00179     }else A_dists = 0;
00180   }
00181 
00182   inline void
00183   init()
00184   {
00185     A_closest_pts = 0;
00186     A_dists = 0; 
00187   }
00188 
00189   geometry::TriMeshSphere A_mesh_surf;
00190   my_float_t *A_closest_pts;  
00191   my_float_t *A_dists;        
00192   static const uint A_num_terms;
00193 };

00195 class ModelHbondSurfaces : public HbondSurfaces<model_hbond_surf_t>{
00196 
00197 public:
00198   typedef HbondSurfaces<model_hbond_surf_t>::surfaces_vci m_surf_vci;
00199 
00200   ModelHbondSurfaces(const std::string fname, PDBBase& rad_atoms,
00201                      const verbose_level_t verbosity = VERBOSE_SILENT);
00202 
00203   virtual ~ModelHbondSurfaces()
00204   { ; }
00205 
00206   bool
00207   write_msms_caps(std::string &ofname_pref)
00208   {
00209 
00210     std::ofstream face_file, vert_file;
00211     if(!open_ofstream(vert_file, ofname_pref + ".vert")) return false;
00212     if(!open_ofstream(face_file, ofname_pref + ".face")) return false;
00213 
00214     m_surf_vci hb_surf = surf_caps_begin();
00215     hb_surf->write_msms_headers(vert_file, face_file);
00216     for( ; hb_surf != surf_caps_end(); ++hb_surf){
00217       // This is bad, but need to be fast for now -- later we should
00218       // just renumber the verts
00219       hb_surf->write_msms_cap(vert_file, face_file);
00220       vert_file << "\n<+++++ END +++++>";
00221       face_file << "\n<+++++ END +++++>";
00222     }
00223     return true;
00224   }
00225 
00227   const size_t
00228   num_A_D_points() const
00229   { return A_num_A_D_points; }
00230 
00232   const size_t
00233   num_polar_points() const
00234   { return A_num_polar_points; }
00235   
00236 private:
00237   void
00238   init()
00239   {
00240     A_num_A_D_points = 0;
00241     A_num_polar_points = 0;
00242   }

00244   size_t A_num_A_D_points;
00245   size_t A_num_polar_points;
00246 
00247 };
